Components.Label: Consignee Name & Address
Notify Party
Provider
Real Consignee
Real Shipper
Print
Components.Query:
SELECT 
FORMAT(si.IssueDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS isseudate,
SUM( ISNULL(ct.Weight,0)) AS sumgw,
SUM(ISNULL(ct.CBM,0)) AS sumcbm,
SUM(ISNULL(ct.PKG,0)) AS sumpkg,
  (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(contN.Name, ' x ', ROUND(inc.Quantity, 0)), ' & ') AS Containers
     FROM EntityContainer inc
     LEFT JOIN MasterData contN ON inc.ContainerTypeId = contN.Id
     WHERE inc.EntityId = '{Id}') AS Containers

 FROM 
dbo.ShipmentSI si LEFT JOIN dbo.EntityContainer ct ON ct.EntityId=si.Id 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData loaicont ON loaicont.Id = ct.ContainerTypeId
WHERE si.Id='{Id}' 
GROUP BY si.Id, si.IssueDate

SELECT si.Code,ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS contno,
 ISNULL(ct.SealNo,0) AS sealno, 
 ISNULL(ct.PKG,0) as PKG,
 ISNULL(ct.Description,'') AS Desctiption, 
 ISNULL(ct.Weight,0)AS weightt, 
 ISNULL(ct.CBM,0) AS cbm , ISNULL(loaicont.Name,'') AS tencont
 FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct  JOIN dbo.ShipmentSI si ON si.Id = ct.EntityId 
 LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData loaicont ON ct.ContainerTypeId=loaicont.Id 
WHERE si.Id='{Id}'  and loaicont.Name is not null
Components.Template:
${CLogo}   ${CCompanyName}
Address: ${CAddress}
Hotline:1900 3133
Email: 
     
SHIPPING INSTRUCTION
             
To :  ${Provider}   Date   ${isseudate}
Attn : ${PIC}        

 

Please issue MB/L as Booking No:  ${Booking No} following details:

 

1. SHIPPER: ${ShipperDes}
2. CONSIGNEE: ${ConsigneeDes}
   
3. Notify party: ${NotifyPartyDes}
         
4. Port of Loading   Port of Discharge    Port of Delivery
         

5. Description of goods

 

Container/Seal No. Type Packages Description of Goods G.W (KGS) CBM
{contno}/{sealno} {tencont} {PKG} {Desctiption} {weightt} {cbm}
TOTAL: ${Containers} ${sumpkg}   ${sumgw} ${sumcbm}
 
6. Freight and Charge: ${Payment term}
Please fax us the draft of MBL to check before issue the original.
 
Thanks for your Co-operation.
 
Brgds,
